jobFunction: Quality Assurance, Project Management, and Science
description:
Our client, a leading testing and inspection provider to the pharmaceutical industry, is searching for a an experienced Operations Manager for an exciting new buildout opportunity! This person will be tasked with setting up a new line of testing services and managing the lab buildout process.
This role is fully onsite in Greater Los Angeles area. Relocation assistance can be considered for the right candidate.
Requirements:
  • Experience with lab buildouts
  • Background in Microbiology
  • Experience managing a full P/L, as well as CapEx

Responsibilities:
  • Manage the day to day operations and buildout of a new microbiology testing service lab
  • Oversight of 2 direct reports, with an overall team size of 50-60
  • Provide commercial as well as technical oversight into the buildout of this new service line

If you are interested, please apply and we will reach out with more information on the role!
benefits: Medical insurance, Vision insurance, Dental insurance, 401(k)
